SEARCH
Package lubiku.castleQuest.Controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
lubiku.castleQuest.Controller.MainController
public class MainController extends Object

MainController

The MainController class is responsible for managing the main functionality and flow of the CastleQuest application. It coordinates the setup and initialization of the application's components, including frames, panels, handlers, and managers. The MainController follows the MVC (Model-View-Controller) architectural pattern to separate concerns and enhance maintainability.

  • Method Details

    • initializeAppFrame

      public void initializeAppFrame()

      initializeAppFrame

      Initializes and sets up a new application frame. This method creates and configures a new application frame using the stored preferences.

    • setUpAppFramePreferences

      private void setUpAppFramePreferences()

      setUpApplicationPreferences

      Sets up the application preferences by retrieving the configuration values from the MainManager - ApplicationWindowManager. The application title, window width, and window height are obtained and stored for later use.
      See Also:
      • MainManager
      • ApplicationWindowManager

    • initializeGameFrame

      public void initializeGameFrame(boolean isLoaded)

      initializeGameFrame

      Initializes and sets up a new game frame. This method handles data access, game preferences, and creates the game panel and game frame. It also sets up the UI for the game panel.
      See Also:
      • GamePanel
      • GameFrame
      • UI

    • createGameFrame

      private GameFrame createGameFrame(GamePanel GAME_PANEL)

      createGameFrame

      Creates a new instance of GameFrame using the specified game panel.
      Parameters:
      GAME_PANEL - The game panel to be used in the GameFrame.
      Returns:
      A new instance of GameFrame with the specified title and game panel.

    • setUpGamePreferences

      private void setUpGamePreferences(boolean isLoaded)

      setUpGamePreferences

      Sets up the game preferences by preparing the game configurations and initializing the pre-game configuration. The game configurations are loaded from the specified game configuration file.

    • prepareGameConfigs

      private void prepareGameConfigs(boolean isLoaded)

      prepareGameConfigs

      Prepares the game configurations by loading them from the specified game configuration file. The loaded configurations are used for the game initialization.

    • createGamePanel

      private GamePanel createGamePanel(String PLAYER_NAME)

      createGamePanel

      Creates a new instance of GamePanel using the specified parameters.
      Returns:
      A new instance of GamePanel with the MainController, Configurator, and player name.

    • connectHandlersToPanel

      public void connectHandlersToPanel(GamePanel GAME_PANEL)

      connectHandlersToPanel

      The KeyHandler, EventHandler, and CollisionHandler are created and connected to the game panel. The MainManager is set as the main manager of the game panel.
      Parameters:
      GAME_PANEL - The game panel to connect the handlers and managers to.

    • connectUItoPanel

      public void connectUItoPanel(GamePanel GAME_PANEL)

      connectUItoPanel

      Connects the UI instance to the specified game panel.
      Parameters:
      GAME_PANEL - The game panel to connect the UI to.

    • runAccumulatorMethod

      public void runAccumulatorMethod(GamePanel GAME_PANEL, Thread thread)

      runAccumulatorMethod

      Runs the accumulator method for managing game loop timing.
      Parameters:
      GAME_PANEL - The game panel to update and repaint.
      thread - The thread used for the game loop.

    • performGameLoop

      private void performGameLoop(GamePanel GAME_PANEL)

      performGameLoop

      Performs the game loop by updating the game panel and triggering a repaint.
      Parameters:
      GAME_PANEL - The game panel to update and repaint.

    • restartGame

      public void restartGame()

      restartGame

      Restarts the game. This method restarts the game by calling the restart method of the MAIN_MANAGER, setting the game state of GAME_PANEL to 1.
      See Also:
      • MainManager

    • backToChooseMapPanel

      public void backToChooseMapPanel(String PLAYER_NAME)

      backToChooseMapPanel

      Navigates back to the choose map panel. This method disposes the current GAME_FRAME, sets up the application frame preferences, initializes a new AppFrame, removes all content from its content pane, initializes the choose map panel with the specified PLAYER_NAME, and makes the AppFrame visible.
      Parameters:
      PLAYER_NAME - the name of the player
